SFCM - Class in clustering.sfcm
This class encapsulates the Spatial Fuzzy C-Means as proposed in: Chuang, Tzeng, Chen Fuzzy c-means clustering with spatial information for image segmentation.
SFCM() - Constructor for class clustering.sfcm.SFCM
The class constructor is private in order to prevent the class from being instantiated
sFCMM - Variable in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMPlugin
The instance of the @link{SFCMManager}
SFCMManager - Class in clustering.sfcm
This class isolates the Spatial Fuzzy C-Means Algorithm (SFC) making it independent from using the ImageJ API.
SFCMManager() - Constructor for class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
 
SFCMPlugin - Class in clustering.sfcm
This class communicates with the user by implementing the ImageJ PlugIn interface It provides an graphical user interface to let the user configure the parameters of the @link{SFCM} algorithm.
SFCMPlugin() - Constructor for class clustering.sfcm.SFCMPlugin

skip(Reader, long) - Static method in class net.sf.ij_plugins.io.IOUtils
Skips over and discards n bytes of data from this input stream.
spatialFunction - Variable in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
A string containing the currently selected spatial function kind Default value is "Likeliest Cluster"
spatialFunctions - Static variable in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
A string array containing the allowed spatial function strings that identify the kind of the spatial function used in the SFCM algorithm Listed values are: "Likeliest Cluster", "Weightiest Cluster"
spatialFunctionWeight - Variable in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
A double used to weight the spatial function in the SFCM algorithm.
stopCriterion - Variable in class clustering.fcm.FCMManager
 
stopCriterion - Variable in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
THe string containing the currently chosen value for the stop criterion.
stopCriterions - Static variable in class clustering.fcm.FCMManager
 
stopCriterions - Static variable in class clustering.sfcm.SFCMManager
An array of strings listing the allowed stopping criterions for the algorithm Listed values are: "Frobenius Norm on U", "Frobenius Norm on V", "Max Norm on U", "Max Norm on V"
subtract(float[], float[]) - Static method in class vectorLib.VectorMath
